trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code ``` XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement("item","urn:1")); doc.Save(Console.Out); ``` generates this xmls attribute: ``` <item xmls="urn:1"/> ``` This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende C# kode ``` XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement("item","urn:1")); doc.Save(Console.Out); ``` genererer attributten xmls: ``` <item xmls="urn:1"/> ``` denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: Note that only the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A> method enforces a well-formed XML document.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at bare den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>metoden fremtvinger et korrekt utformet XML-dokument.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other `Save` overloads only guarantee a well-formed fragment.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre `Save` overlastingene garantere bare et velformet fragment.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.

trans-unit.source: The operation would not result in a well formed XML document (for example, no document element or duplicate XML declarations).
trans-unit.target: Operasjonen vil ikke føre til en korrekt utformet XML-dokumentet (for eksempel ingen dokumentet elementet eller dupliserte XML deklareringer).

trans-unit.source: Returns the Post-Schema-Validation-Infoset (PSVI) of the node.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer Post-Schema-validering-Infoset (PSVI) for noden.

trans-unit.source: The PSVI contents of this property are set after the node has been validated.
trans-unit.target: PSVI innholdet for denne egenskapen er angitt etter noden har blitt validert.

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"></xref> object representing the PSVI of the node.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"> </xref> -objekt som representerer PSVI av noden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> object associated with this <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The schemas contained in an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object associated with an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object are used for validation when the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> is executed.
trans-unit.target: XML-skjemaer i en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>tilknyttet en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objektet brukes til kontroll når den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>metoden for en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>er utført.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object is initialized with XML data from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object is loaded from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Schemas%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>-objektet er initialisert med XML-data fra en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet i <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>objektet er lastet inn fra den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Schemas%2A>for den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Schemas%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> object containing the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas associated with this <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>; otherwise, an empty <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> objektet som inneholder XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD)-skjemaene som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref>; Hvis ikke returneres en tom <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Validates the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*> property.
trans-unit.target: Validerer den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> mot XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD)-skjemaene som finnes i den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*>

trans-unit.source: The Validate method validates the XML data in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> against the schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Valider validerer XML-dataene i den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>mot skjemaene i den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The Validate method performs infoset augmentation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Valider utfører infoset styrkes.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, after successful validation, schema defaults are applied, text values are converted to atomic values as necessary, and type information is associated with validated information items.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt etter vellykket validering skjemaet standarder brukes tekstverdier konverteres til atomic verdier etter behov og typeinformasjonen er knyttet til godkjent informasjonselementene.

trans-unit.source: The result is a previously un-typed XML sub-tree in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> replaced with a typed sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet er en tidligere ikke-typeangitt XML-undertreet i den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>erstattet med en typeangitt undertreet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the Validate method.
trans-unit.target: Følgende er viktige hensyn å ta når du bruker Valider-metoden.

trans-unit.source: - Schema location hints like `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: -Skjema plassering tipsene som `xsi:schemaLocation` eller `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: - Inline schemas are ignored.
trans-unit.target: -Innebygde skjemaer ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: - If schema validation errors occur during validation the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> becomes partially validated with some nodes with correct type information and some without.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis skjemavalideringsfeil oppstår under validering av <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>delvis er godkjent med noen noder med riktig typeinformasjon og noen uten.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: - The validation process includes checking for uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`).
trans-unit.target: -Valideringen inkluderer søk etter begrensninger for unikhet og referanse (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, og `xs:unique`).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> object that receives information about schema validation warnings and errors.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> objektet som mottar informasjon om skjemaet Valideringsadvarsler og feil.

trans-unit.source: A schema validation event occurred and no <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> object was specified.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en XML-validering hendelse, og ingen <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> objekt ble angitt.

trans-unit.source: Validates the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object specified against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*> property.
trans-unit.target: Validerer den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> mot XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD) skjemaene i det angitte objektet i <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*>

trans-unit.source: The Validate method validates the XML data in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object against the schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Valider validerer XML-dataene i den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>objektet mot skjemaene i den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: The Validate method performs infoset augmentation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Valider utfører infoset styrkes.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, after successful validation, schema defaults are applied, text values are converted to atomic values as necessary, and type information is associated with validated information items.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt etter vellykket validering skjemaet standarder brukes tekstverdier konverteres til atomic verdier etter behov og typeinformasjonen er knyttet til godkjent informasjonselementene.

trans-unit.source: The result is a previously un-typed XML sub-tree in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> replaced with a typed sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet er en tidligere ikke-typeangitt XML-undertreet i den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>erstattet med en typeangitt undertreet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the Validate method.
trans-unit.target: Følgende er viktige hensyn å ta når du bruker Valider-metoden.

trans-unit.source: - Schema location hints like `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: -Skjema plassering tipsene som `xsi:schemaLocation` eller `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: - Inline schemas are ignored.
trans-unit.target: -Innebygde skjemaer ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: - If schema validation errors occur during validation the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> becomes partially validated with some nodes with correct type information and some without.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis skjemavalideringsfeil oppstår under validering av <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>delvis er godkjent med noen noder med riktig typeinformasjon og noen uten.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: If the node to validate is the root node, the validation process includes checking for uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`); otherwise, uniqueness and reference constraints are omitted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noden til å validere rotnoden, valideringen inkluderer søk etter begrensninger for unikhet og referanse (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, og `xs:unique`); ellers begrensninger for unikhet og referanse utelates.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> object that receives information about schema validation warnings and errors.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> objektet som mottar informasjon om skjemaet Valideringsadvarsler og feil.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object created from an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> to validate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet er opprettet fra en <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> til å validere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object parameter was not created from an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet parameteren ble ikke opprettet fra en <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object parameter is not an element, attribute, document fragment, or the root node.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objekt-parameteren er ikke et element, attributtet, Dokumentfragment eller rotnoden.

trans-unit.source: A schema validation event occurred and no <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> object was specified.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en XML-validering hendelse, og ingen <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> objekt ble angitt.

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref> node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer alle underordnede noder for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""> </xref> node til den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: It is functionally equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.InnerXml%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilsvarer det Funksjonsmessig den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.InnerXml%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.InnerXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property determines the encoding that is written out.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen angir kodingen som skrives ut.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the `Encoding` property does not have a value, the `XmlDocument` is written out without an encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `Encoding` egenskapen har ikke en verdi av `XmlDocument` skrives uten et koding attributt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.

trans-unit.source: Saves the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref> node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""> </xref> node til den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: It is functionally equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilsvarer det Funksjonsmessig den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property determines the encoding that is written out.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen angir kodingen som skrives ut.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the `Encoding` property does not have a value, the `XmlDocument` is written out without an encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `Encoding` egenskapen har ikke en verdi av `XmlDocument` skrives uten et koding attributt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> to use for resolving external resources.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> skal brukes for å løse eksterne ressurser.

trans-unit.source: The `XmlResolver` can be used to load DTDs or expand entity references.
trans-unit.target: Den `XmlResolver` kan brukes til å laste inn DTDer eller Vis enheten refererer til.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, you can set credentials on the `XmlResolver` to access resources stored on a secure network resource.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen, kan du angi legitimasjonen på den `XmlResolver` til å få tilgang til ressurser som er lagret på en sikker nettverksressurs.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - If the document was not loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> (that is, if it was loaded using a stream, file, and so on) the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlDocument` is always used.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis dokumentet ikke ble lastet inn med en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>(det vil si hvis det ble lastet inn med en dataflyt, filen, og så videre) i `XmlResolver` på den `XmlDocument` alltid brukes.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - If the document was loaded with an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>, the resolver on the `XmlTextReader` is used to resolve any DTD references in the DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis dokumentet ble lastet inn med en <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>, Løsningsprogrammet på den `XmlTextReader` brukes til å løse eventuelle DTD-referanser i noden DocumentType.</xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>

trans-unit.source: The resolver on the `XmlDocument` is used to expand any entity references.
trans-unit.target: Løsningsprogrammet på den `XmlDocument` brukes til å utvide enhetsreferanser.

trans-unit.source: - If the document was loaded with an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, the resolver on the `XmlDocument` is never used.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis dokumentet ble lastet inn med en <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, Løsningsprogrammet på den `XmlDocument` aldri brukt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>

trans-unit.source: - If the document was loaded with a class that extends `XmlReader` and the `XmlReader` cannot resolve entities (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A> returns `false`), the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlDocument` is used to resolve any references in the DocumentType node and to expand any entity references.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis dokumentet ble lastet inn med en klasse som utvider `XmlReader` og `XmlReader` kan ikke løse enheter (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A> returnerer `false`), `XmlResolver` på den `XmlDocument` brukes til å løse eventuelle referanser i noden DocumentType og Vis enhetsreferanser.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `XmlDocument` is loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> which had an `XmlResolver` set to it, the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlReader` is not cached by the `XmlDocument` after <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> completes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den `XmlDocument` er lastet inn med en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>som har en `XmlResolver` angitt, den `XmlResolver` på den `XmlReader` ikke er bufret av den `XmlDocument` når <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>er fullført.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the.NET Framework, if this property is not set, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, bestemmer klareringsnivået for applikasjonen i versjon 1.1 av.NET Framework standard virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: `Fully trusted code:` The document uses a default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: `Fully trusted code:`Dokumentet bruker en standard <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>med ingen legitimasjonsbeskrivelse.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If authentication is required to access a network resource, use the `XmlResolver` property to specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenning kreves for å få tilgang til en nettverksressurs, kan du bruke den `XmlResolver` til å angi en `XmlResolver` med legitimasjonen som er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` The `XmlResolver` property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:`Den `XmlResolver` er satt til `null`.

trans-unit.source: External resources are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: Eksterne ressurser løses ikke.

trans-unit.source: For more information on security and the `XmlResolver` property, see [Resolving External Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om sikkerhet og `XmlResolver` egenskapen se [løsning eksterne ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlResolver" name="XmlResolver" href=""></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlResolver" name="XmlResolver" href=""></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the.NET Framework, the caller must be fully trusted in order to specify an <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlResolver" name="XmlResolver" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: I versjon 1.1 av.NET Framework-Oppkalleren må være fullstendig klarerte for å angi en <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlResolver" name="XmlResolver" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and an external DTD or entity is encountered.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> og en ekstern DTD eller enheten blir funnet.
